text.section: A statement of the optometric service to be paid for by the corporation, and if any optometric service is excepted, a statement of such exception.
A statement of the duration of the agreement and of the terms and conditions upon which it may be extended, renewed, revised, canceled or otherwise terminated.
A statement of the period of grace which will be allowed for making any payment due from the subscriber under the contract, which in any event shall not be less than ten days.
